roleset.name: concealing

role.descr: thing hidden (if in addition to arg0)

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: The guerrillas' conscription of Cruz-Diaz as a child, his fleeing from the guerrillas, and his hiding from both the guerrillas and the army and fleeing for fear of retribution from both does not establish a political opinion on his part.
example.arg: from both the guerrillas and the army
example.note: Agentive self-hiders are arg0. Interpret an unstated 'himself' as arg1.

example.name: all args
example.text: I can understand their hiding themselves from a creditor, or any other obnoxious person...
example.arg: from a creditor, or any other obnoxious person

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, hide.01. Corresponds to VNcls concealment-16-1.
